title: Is there any history regarding buried treasure in Southeastern North Carolina?
text:
This previous post at MyReporter.com should answer your question:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=584



If you would like more information, here's a link to local history
resources: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=832



And some local bookstores: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=423
